018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022
023import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
024import java.util.EnumSet;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Set;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
029
030import org.apiguardian.api.API;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
032import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
033import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet;
034
035/**
036 *  <p>{@summary This inline tag inserts an HTML anchor into the documentation
037 *  that can be used for references to the location of that anchor.} It can be
038 *  used as this:</p>
039 *  <pre><code>&hellip; {&#64;anchor #&lt;<i>anchor</i>&gt; &lt;<i>text</i>&gt;} &hellip;</code></pre>
040 *  <p>That allows to reference the &lt;text&gt; by the anchor &lt;anchor&gt;
041 *  like this:</p>
042 *  <pre><code>&hellip; &lt;a href=&quot;#anchor&quot;&gt;&hellip;&lt;/a&gt; &hellip;</code></pre>
043 *  <p>Or, with the {@code href} tag:</p>
044 *  <pre><code>&hellip; {&#64;href #anchor &hellip;}</code></pre>
045 *  <p>The hash symbol (&quot;#&quot;) before the anchor name is mandatory!</p>
046 *
047 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: AnchorTaglet.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.0.5
050 *
051 *  @see HRefTaglet
052 */
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AnchorTaglet.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
055public final class AnchorTaglet implements Taglet
056{
057        /*-----------*\
058    ====** Constants **========================================================
059        \*-----------*/
060    /**
061     *  The name of this taglet: {@value}.
062     */
063    public static final String TAGLET_NAME = "anchor";
064
065        /*------------------------*\
066    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
067        \*------------------------*/
068    /**
069     *  The pattern for the tag.
070     */
071    private static final Pattern PATTERN;
072
073    static
074    {
075        try
076        {
077            //noinspection RegExpRedundantEscape
078            PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "\\{@" + TAGLET_NAME + " #(?<name>.*?) (?<contents>.*)\\}" );
079        }
080        catch( final PatternSyntaxException e )
081        {
082            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
083        }
084    }
085
086        /*--------------*\
087    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
088        \*--------------*/
089    /**
090     *  Creates a new {@code AnchorTaglet} instance.
091     */
092    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantNoArgConstructor" )
093    public AnchorTaglet() { /* Just exists */ }
094
095        /*---------*\
096    ====** Methods **==========================================================
097        \*---------*/
098    /**
099     *  {@inheritDoc}
100     */
101    @Override
102    public final Set<Location> getAllowedLocations() { return EnumSet.allOf( Location.class ); }
103
104    /**
105     *  {@inheritDoc}
106     */
107    @Override
108    public final String getName() { return TAGLET_NAME; }
109
110    /**
111     *  {@inheritDoc}
112     */
113    @Override
114    public final boolean isInlineTag() { return true; }
115
116    /**
117     *  {@inheritDoc}
118     */
119    @Override
120    public final String toString( final List<? extends DocTree> tags, final Element element )
121    {
122        final var tag = tags.get( 0 ).toString();
123        final var matcher = PATTERN.matcher( tag );
124        final var retValue = matcher.matches() ? format( "<a id=\"%2$s\">%1$s</a>", matcher.group( "contents" ), matcher.group( "name" ) ) : tag;
125
126        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
127        return retValue;
128    }   //  toString()
129}
130//  class AnchorTaglet
131
132/*
133 *  End of File
134 */
